pages.text: Elementally attuned herbs are rather picky about what they will grow on, as fickle as the elements themselves. Runic Soil is a special kind of soil that can be further refined into different forms, upon which a corresponding elemental plant may grow.

pages.name: Magmatic Soil
pages.text: $(l:herbs/infernal_bulb)Infernal Bulbs$() can grow in this magmatic soil.$(br2)Created by using a knife on runic soil while holding an $(l:herbs/infernal_bulb)Infernal Bulb$() in your offhand, which is consumed in the process.

pages.name: Aqueous Soil
pages.text: $(l:herbs/dewgonia)Dewgonia$() can grow in this aquatic soil.$(br2)Created by using a knife on runic soil while holding a $(l:herbs/dewgonia)Dewgonia$() in your offhand, which is consumed in the process.

pages.name: Aeros Soil
pages.text: $(l:herbs/cloud_berry)Cloud Berries$() can grow in this air-infused soil.$(br2)Created by using a knife on runic soil while holding a $(l:herbs/cloud_berry)Cloud Berry$() in your offhand, which is consumed in the process.

pages.name: Terra Soil
pages.text: $(l:herbs/stalicripe)Stalicripe$() can grow in this earthen soil.$(br2)Created by using a knife on runic soil while holding an $(l:herbs/stalicripe)Stalicripe$() in your offhand, which is consumed in the process.
